title: Recieving an Inactivity Notification Even Though I Play Daily
body: So for the past 3 days I have been recieving notifications about getting demoted in "x" amount of days. I play ranked nearly every day and have for months now. I usually even play more than once a day, up to many times. I'm afraid there is a bug and I might get demoted for no reason. Please look into my account.

replies.body: This might just be a visual error, I recommend reporting it to the[ client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards.  As long as you have been playing, you shouldn't have to worry about decay.  The ranked ladder manages your stats, not the client!
If u play only solo duo everyday that inactivity notification might be for flex ranked.
